Koel Mallick Wiki | Biography | Age | Height | Boyfriend | Family | Profile

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Koel Mallick (কোয়েল মল্লিক) is an Indian Bengali Film Actress who appears in Bengali and Odia films. She Established herself as a one of the popular & Highest-Paid Bengali Actress. Koel debut in Bengali Movie by Nater guru in 2003. Nater Guru was a “runaway success” at the box office and Koel become heartthrob of the Bengali audience immediately after this film got released.

Biography & Wiki

Koel’s real name is Rukmini. She was born on 28 April 1982 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 37 years. Koel Mallick’s Zodiac is Taurus. Her hometown is Kolkata, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Koel Mallick is the daughter of famous actor Ranjit Mallick and her mother’s name is Deepa Mallick. She is from the Mallick family which is a very pronounced family of Kolkata. Furthermore, Their family is well known for their traditional Durga Puja.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Koel Mallick got married to Nispal Singh (Rane) on 1 February 2013. She dated Nispal Singh for seven years before their marriage.

Favourite Things and Hobbies

Salary and Net Worth

Koel Mallick’s immovable property amounting to Rs.15 Crore. Furthermore, her Salary per movie is approximately 30 lakhs.

Education and School, College

Koel Mallick has completed her schooling from Modern High School for Girls, Kolkata. Later on completed her BSC (Honors) in Psychology from Gokhale Memorial Girls’ College, Kolkata.

Contact Address

Awards

  • 4th Tele Cine Awards 2004 for the film Nater Guru (2003)
  • 2006 Kalakar Awards, for Subhodrishti (2005)
  • ZEE Bangla Gourav Samman Award for Best Actress (Bolo Na Tumi Amar, 2010)
  • Star Jalsha Award for Best Actress (Dui Prithibi, 2010)
  • BFJA Awards 2013 for Best Actress Hemlock Society (2012)
  • ZEE Bangla Gourav Samman Award for Best Actress (Hemlock Society, 2012)

Controversy and Facts about Koel Mallick

  • There was a rumor that Koel was having an issue in her family life with Nispal Singh and they were going to file a divorce. But Koel denied all these rumors.
  • She doesn’t like to take pout selfie.
  • She has also done TV commercial ads for ‘TVS Motor Company’, ‘Fair & Lovely’, ‘Panasonic’, ‘Vaseline’ etc.

Koel Mallick filmography

Koel Mallick started her career in 2003 with Bengali Movie Nater Guru which was a “runaway success” at the box office. In 2004 she acted in Bandhan which was also a huge hit in the box office. After that, Koel appeared in Yuddho in 2005 opposite actors Mithun Chakraborty and Debashree Roy. The film recorded an initial collection of ₹ 12 million (12 million) in its first week. In 2006 she appeared in MLA Fatakeshto.
